doc.title: Chelsey & Kelsey Are Really Good Roommates
doc.plot: Eight months ago, fate brought Chelsey and Kelsey together when, while shopping at the Container Store, they both realized that sharing a place in Brentwood was better than having one's own place in North Hollywood. These attractively single girls support each other through the daily struggle to live a life of leisure. They're not, like, best friends... but they're really good roommates.
